main_definition: To provide assistance or support to someone in need.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Assist or aid in an action or process.
meanings_and_examples.example: I helped my friend move into his new apartment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Make things easier for someone by providing resources, guidance, or expertise.
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher helped the student understand complex mathematical concepts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To intervene in a situation to alleviate problems or difficulties.
meanings_and_examples.example: Emergency responders helped the victims of the car accident.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Provide encouragement, motivation, or emotional support to someone.
meanings_and_examples.example: My family and friends helped me overcome my fear of public speaking by providing constant encouragement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To participate in a joint effort towards achieving a common goal or solving a problem together.
meanings_and_examples.example: We all pitched in to help clean up the park after the festival.
